Package cz.vse.java.util.persistance.entities.orders

Class OrdersContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vse.java.util.persistance.entities.orders.OrdersContainer
  • public class OrdersContainer
extends java.lang.Object

    The class of OrdersContainer is used to abstractly define the type of the instances.

    Written for project "Connections2".
    Version:
    12. 04. 2020
    Author:
    Vojtěch Pavlů

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrdersContainer

        public OrdersContainer()

        Simple constructor defining the final CopyOnWriteArrayList for the Orders.

    • Method Detail

      • addAll

        public void addAll​(java.util.List<Order> orders,
                   boolean clearBefore)

        Adds all the given Orders stored in List instance.

        The addition is provided by add(Order) method.

        Also provides ability to clear the field before adding any orders - by setting the parameter of clearBefore to true. When it's false, it adds it by rules of the add(Order) method.

        Parameters:
        orders - List of Orders to be added
        clearBefore - boolean value of if the field should be cleared before adding. When true, the addition is gonna be a bit faster (because of the definition of simple adding method in this class implemented), but won't let stored any of the orders that was there before and are not in the given list.
        See Also:
        add(Order), Order, OrderService, List, CopyOnWriteArrayList

      • add

        public void add​(Order order)

        Adds an Order instance to the field - to the container.

        Before adding, it's checked if it exist. When it doesn't, it won't be added. After that, it's checked against all the others already contained - when there is any of the contained with the same id as it's provided, it's uploaded - the old one is removed and replaced with the new one.

        May cause problems while no DB connection is provided.

        Parameters:
        order - to be added
        See Also:
        Order, OrderService, OrderService.exists(IEntity), addAll(List, boolean)

      • remove

        public void remove​(Order order)

        Simply removes the order from the container.

        Parameters:
        order - to be removed

      • autoUpdate

        public void autoUpdate​(boolean clear)
                throws java.sql.SQLException

        Auto-update of the container using DB. Also provides "clear before" procedure. It's recommended to do so everytime for preventing storing data (orders) that are not in the DB anymore. But can be useful not to use it sometimes.

        May cause errors when it's not able for connecting the DB.

        Parameters:
        clear - if should be the field cleared before storing new orders in it from DB
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - when there is problem with connection to DB.

      • getOrders

        public java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Order> getOrders()
        Getter for CopyOnWriteArrayList formed orders of the instance of OrdersContainer
        Returns:
        the value of orders
        See Also:
        CopyOnWriteArrayList, OrdersContainer, Order

      • getUnfinished

        public java.util.List<Order> getUnfinished()

        First of all, it updates the container. After that, it checks all the Orders, their OrderItems and Tasks linked to them.

        Returns:
        List of unfinished Order, ie orders theirs OrderItem's Task are not set to state of ETaskState.DONE.
        See Also:
        Task, Order, OrderItem, ETaskState, autoUpdate(boolean)
